snippet: Danilo Gallinari led six Denver players in double figures with 17 points, and the host Nuggets stopped the Los Angeles Clippers’ franchise-record winning streak at 17 games.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Denver Nuggets put an end to Los Angeles Clippers franchise-record winning streak at 17 games with a 92-78 victory; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Danilo Gallinari led six Denver players in double figures with 17 points, and the host Nuggets stopped the Los Angeles Clippers’ franchise-record winning streak at 17 games.

headline.seo: Nuggets End Winning Roll by Clippers at 17 Games
headline.main: Nuggets End Winning Roll by Clippers at 17 Games
headline.print_headline: Nuggets End Winning Roll By Clippers At 17 Games
